entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 9 April 2023
